item.title: By: darcyward
item.dc:creator: darcyward
item.content:encoded:
The first day of GSP West is over and it was a great one. We heard from a lot of good speakers and seen a few good pitches. We even had a complimentary drink from Facebook!

As Daniel eluded to, I did indeed take lots of notes and will do my best to summarize the key themes, insights, and relevance to web 2.0 Ireland once the hectic two day conference is over.

Just in case anyone can’t wait that long here’s a good writeup by Sean Ammirati of Read/WriteWeb; it’s about Charlene Li’s (Forrester.com) opening keynote entitled

The Future of Social Networks at Graphing Social Patterns

item.title: By: Daniel Becker
item.dc:creator: Daniel Becker
item.description:
Garry and I are here as well. I can confirm that Darcy is taking lots of notes. So far the speakers have been really good.
Anybody else from Ireland at GSP or at ETech?
Daniel
